alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:03AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northwest Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area, Buckeye/Avondale, Deer Valley, Central Phoenix, North Phoenix/Glendale, Scottsdale/Paradise Valley, The East Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area, Fountain Hills/East Mesa, South Mountain/Ahwatukee and Southeast Valley/Queen Creek. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
